subsection.name: Build Procedure
subsection.p: The DPML platform has the following major product groups:
To build respective products a build.bat and build.sh script are provided.
subsection.pre: $ build all .. builds all of the DPML core products
subsection.p: You can also build a selected product:
subsection.pre: $ build transit $ build magic $ build metro $ build depot
subsection.p: Finally, the build script also enables the creation of distributions using a release identifier. The following example build the distributiing using the build identifier 1234.
Any issues concerning building of the platform should be directed to the DPML dev mailing list.
